content: अग्रिम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अग्रे भवः; अग्र-डिमच् <ls>P. IV. 3. 23.</ls> <ab>Vārt.</ab>] {@--1@} First (in order, rank &c); foremost, best, excellent, preferable, superior; वीराणामग्रिमो भूत्वा युयुधे पार्थिवैः सह <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--2@} Prior, preceding. {@--3@} Elder, eldest. {@--4@} Furthest, advanced, first ripe. {@--5@} Further. --मः An elder brother. --मा A kind of fruit, Annona Reticulata.
